evidence.text: Defendants are also temporarily restrained from “delet[ing], destroy[ing], remov[ing], or impair[ing] any data, database or other CFPB records; terminat[ing] any CFPB employee

extracted.value: Defendants are temporarily restrained from deleting, destroying, removing, or impairing any data, database or other CFPB records.

evidence.text: terminat[ing] any CFPB employee, except for cause related to the specific employee’s performance or conduct; [and] issu[ing] any notice of reduction-in-force to any CFPB employee.

extracted.value: Defendants are temporarily restrained from terminating any CFPB employee, except for cause related to the specific employee’s performance or conduct.

evidence.text: issu[ing] any notice of reduction-in-force to any CFPB employee.

extracted.value: Defendants are temporarily restrained from issuing any notice of reduction-in-force to any CFPB employee.

evidence.text: not to “transfer, relinquish, or return any money from the CFPB’s reserve funds.”

extracted.value: Defendants are temporarily restrained from transferring, relinquishing, or returning any money from the CFPB’s reserve funds.

evidence.text: This Order will remain in effect until a ruling on the plaintiffs’ preliminary injunction motion is entered.

extracted.value: This Order will remain in effect until a ruling on the plaintiffs’ preliminary injunction motion is entered.
